sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    article.card.card-app(data-aos="fade-up")
        h3.card__title Application of the day
        router-link(to="/application").card__link 
            span More details
</template>

<script>

    export default {
        name: 'CardApp',
        data: function(){
            return {}
        }
    }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .card {
        background: linear-gradient(134.98deg, #3B7FD4 7.03%, #0952A7 140.8%);
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: center;
        background-size: cover;
        height: 331px;
        width: 353px;
        box-shadow: 0px 4px 30px rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.08);
        border-radius: 6px;
        display: inline-block;
        overflow: hidden;
        position: relative;
        padding: 62px 0;
        text-align: center;
        transition: .3s all ease;
        color: #fff;

        &:hover {
            box-shadow: 0px 4px 30px rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.13);
        }

        &__title {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Semibold';
            font-size: 30px;
            line-height: 36px;
            max-width: 218px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        &__link {
            width: 139px;
            height: 40px;
            background: #FFFFFF;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            border-radius: 100px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Semibold';
            font-size: 10px;
            line-height: 19px;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            color: #37393E;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: .3s all ease;
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            bottom: 62px;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            // margin: 95px auto 0 auto;

            span {
                position: relative;
                z-index: 2;
            }

            &:hover:after {
                opacity: 1;
            }

            &:after {
                content: '';
                width: 100%;
                height: 100%;
                border-radius: 100px;
                border: none;
                position: absolute;
                top: 0;
                left: 0;
                opacity: 0;
                background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85)), linear-gradient(189.87deg, #357FDB -14.01%, #2361AA 109.14%);
                transition: .3s all ease;
            }
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 1200px) {
        .card {
            width: 300px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 960px) {
        .card {
            height: 415px;
            width: 47.5%;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 640px) {
        .card {
            height: 337px;
            padding-top: 77px;

            &__link {
                bottom: 78px;
            }
        }
    }
</style>
